title: Basic html datetime-local input test
description: A basic html datetime-local input test.

narrator.edge: unable to change the value without using the date picker widget

chrome.output: unable to get to the control

chrome.notes: each part of the date (month, day, and year) is rendered as its own tab stop and control

chrome.output: "month, enter a date, edit spin box, 12"

results.notes: role implied by the embedded spin box

chrome.output: "enter a date, datetime edit, 12/12/2012 07:30 pm, show date picker"
in list of form fields as "enter a date, edit, 2012-12-12T19:30"

results.notes: for example, if you press "up arrow" or "down arrow" on any of the embedded spin boxes

chrome.output: embedded controls for month, date, year, and time are conveyed correctly, however controls within the date picker are not conveyed.

ie.output: "edit, 2012-12-12T19:30, enter a date, edit, 2012-12-12T19:30, type in text"
"enter a date, edit, 2012-12-12T19:30, type in text"
in list of form fields as "enter a date edit 2012-12-12T19:30"

firefox.output: "enter a date, edit, 2012-12-12T19:30, type in text"
"enter a date, edit, 2012-12-12T19:30, type in text"
in list of form fields as "enter a date edit 2012-12-12T19:30"

edge.output: "enter a date, local date and time, december 12, 2012, 7:30 pn"

results.notes: the embedded button role does not clearly convey the role for the entire input

edge.output: "enter a date, date, 12-12-2012, december 12, 2012, suggestions available, 12 of 31, selected"
after changing the value in the widget and activating the button accept button, the date input was focused but the new value was not conveyed.

results.notes: Scan mode must be manually turned off to interact with widgets

edge.output: embedded controls for month, date, and year, and time are conveyed correctly and operable

results.notes: embedded roles were conveyed, but not the outer control

results.notes: for example, if you enter "1" into the month field, "1" is announced followed by "01"

and_chr.output: was possible to change the date and time, however groupings of buttons was not conveyed.
input was flagged with a number
was able to open the date picker and set a new date and time

ios_saf.output: focus was sent to the format controls button at the top of the window and new value was not conveyed
was able to set the time with the widget however embedded controls were missing labels.

ios_saf.output: was able to change do a desired date and time. said "show numbers" followed by "increment <number>" for the corresponding control.

safari.output: input was flagged with a number

chrome.output: Embedded controls were flagged for disambiguation
embedded controls were flagged for disambiguation

was able to open the date picker but not interact with any elements in the date picker. was unable to set the value for embedded controls such as the year by saying "numeral 1955", however "up arrow" and "down arrow" adjusted the values.

results.notes: partial because it was still possible to use some of the controls and enter a date
